text: Laura Bailey (born May 28, 1981) is an American voice actress. Some of the characters she voiced are Lucina in the Fire Emblem franchise, Blaze the Cat in Sonic the Hedgehog, and Chun-Li from Street Fighter. She won the BAFTA for Best Performer in a Leading Role and Best Performance at The Game Awards for her role as Abby in The Last of Us Part II. == References == Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Mississippi Category:American television actors Category:American video game actors Category:20th-century American actors Category:21st-century American actors Category:American television producers
title: Laura Bailey
